Rule.Name: Ensure a single firewall configuration utility is in use (Automated)
Rule.NonCompliantComment: Multiple firewall configuration utilities are installed, which may lead to conflicting rules and weaken security.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Ensure that only one firewall utility remains installed; remove or disable any others.
Rule.Correction: Manual review required: use package tools (e.g. dpkg -l) to list packages such as ufw, iptables-persistent, nftables and uninstall the extras.
